entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:16PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WATER EXPECTED TO CONTINUE IN THE SUSITNA BASIN... High water levels can be expected to continue on the Susitna River and its tributaries through the next couple of days.
